message: @ramen yea your trigger happy it loads pretty quickly for me like a second or so
I think this tends to happen first thing in the morning, when the cache is empty.

Sometimes, when I mouse over the groups drop-down in the header, it takes a moment for it to come up. I don't know if I'm just trigger-happy or what, but I tend to click on it, which causes the page to reload, and then the cycle repeats. Just a minor nit.
